subject:
Re: [cc-community] Do you know about case study on why it is better
	to use CC instead of full Copyright?
body:
Dessi Pefeva :
> Do someone know a review or case study on why it is better to use CC> instead of Copyright for scientific material or presentation on how> to exchange knowledge within a company?
You seem to have misunderstood how the Creative Commons licenseswork. The licenses are copyright licenses, and any work under themthus has to be under copyright.
-- Björn Lindström Student of computational linguistics, Uppsala University, Sweden
